name: Sun and moon Rise and set
short_description: Calc. rise and set for sun and moon. This is a translation of a set of routines from Montenbruk and Pfleger's Astronomy on the Computer 2nd eng. ed - see ch 3.8 The transaltion into a javascrip by Keith Burnett http://bodmas.org/astronomy/riset.html
